sourceClass: Medical Devices, Medical and Pharmaceutical Regulation
text:
2020 JUN 05 (NewsRx) -- By a News Reporter-Staff News Editor at NewsRx Medical
Devices Daily \-- According to news reporting originating from Washington,
D.C., by NewsRx journalists, a U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC)
filing by Cantel Medical Corp. (Form 8-K) was posted on May 22, 2020.

The SIC code for this company is 3841, Surgical and Medical Instruments and
Apparatus.

The SEC file number is 0001104659-20-065490.

The contact information for this company is OVERLOOK AT GREAT NOTCH, 150 CLOVE
ROAD, LITTLE FALLS NJ 07424, 973-890-7220.

Our editors provided additional information about Form 8-K: This is the
"current report" that is used to report the occurrence of any material events
or corporate changes which are of importance to investors or security holders
and previously have not been reported by the registrant. It provides more
current information on certain specified events than would Forms 10-Q or 10-K.

A U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission filing is a formal document or
financial statement submitted to the SEC by publicly-traded companies.

For additional information on this SEC filing see:
<http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/19446/0001104659-20-065490-index.html>.

(Our reports deliver fact-based news of research and discoveries from around
the world.)

title: Cantel Medical Corp. Files SEC Form 8-K, Current Report: (May 26, 2020): Cantel Medical Corp.
html:
2020 JUN 05 (NewsRx) -- By a News Reporter-Staff News Editor at NewsRx Medical Devices Daily -- According to news reporting originating from Washington, D.C., by NewsRx journalists, a U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) filing by Cantel Medical Corp. (Form 8-K) was posted on May 22, 2020.

The SIC code for this company is 3841, Surgical and Medical Instruments and Apparatus.

The SEC file number is 0001104659-20-065490.

The contact information for this company is OVERLOOK AT GREAT NOTCH, 150 CLOVE ROAD, LITTLE FALLS NJ 07424, 973-890-7220.

Our editors provided additional information about Form 8-K: This is the “current report” that is used to report the occurrence of any material events or corporate changes which are of importance to investors or security holders and previously have not been reported by the registrant. It provides more current information on certain specified events than would Forms 10-Q or 10-K.

A U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission filing is a formal document or financial statement submitted to the SEC by publicly-traded companies.

For additional information on this SEC filing see: http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/19446/0001104659-20-065490-index.html.

(Our reports deliver fact-based news of research and discoveries from around the world.)
